title: seqera-services/nf-pooled-cellpainting pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

path.errorMessage: File path must be provided and cannot contain spaces

assay.errorMessage: Assay type must be provided and cannot contain spaces

batch.errorMessage: Batch identifier must be provided and cannot contain spaces

plate.errorMessage: Plate identifier must be provided and cannot contain spaces
